title: Hyper-personalized Gen AI ads trigger curiosity, concern among Indian Gen Z
description: The research reveals that Gen Z displays a complex spectrum of emotional responses to hyper-personalized advertising generated by artificial intelligence. For many participants, AI-generated ads triggered genuine curiosity and interest. These reactions stemmed from the novelty of the medium, the visual sophistication of the content, and the perceived relevance of the messaging.
content: India's digitally native Generation Z is responding to hyper-personalized advertising created by generative artificial intelligence (Gen AI) with a blend of curiosity, caution, and emotional intensity, according to a new study that offers a revealing... [4736 chars]

title: Bernie Sanders Reveals the AI 'Doomsday Scenario' That Worries Top Experts
description: The Vermont senator discusses his fears that artificial intelligence will only enrich the billionaire class, the fight for a 32-hour work week, and the ‘doomsday scenario’ that has some of the world’s top experts deeply concerned.
